FLL Tutorials

A one stop shop for everything FIRST LEGO League

FLL Tutorials
enseñar - compartir - aprender

This website is powered by Droids Robotics, founders of EV3Lessons, and World Festival Champion's award winners.

Through this website, we hope to share our knowledge, as well best practices for getting the most out of your FIRST LEGO League journey. Our goal is to teach, share, and learn together.

Recommended Sites

Este seccion tiene recursos diseñados para el Juego de Robot parte del concurso. Tiene diseños de robots.

Tiene muchos actividades de valores FIRST. También tiene carteles y un diseña camiseta.

Projecto de Innovación

Este seccion tiene mucho recursos para el proyecto y lecciones sobre el proceso del projecto.

About Us

This website was founded in 2018 as a spin-off from EV3Lessons to create a high-quality, free resource for FIRST LEGO League teams to use. Our Mission is not to solve the challenges, but to provide the building blocks and tools to help you to achieve your goals. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Copyright © 2023 FLL Tutorials
